alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 1:27PM MST until October 15 at 2:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 230 PM MST. * At 126 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Downtown Phoenix to near South Mountain Park to 8 miles east of Estrella, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. Blowing dust with visibility as low as one mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Peoria, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, El Mirage, Tolleson, Youngtown, Sun City West, Waddell, Laveen, Cashion and Sun City. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 115 and 152. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 210. AZ Route 51 near mile marker 1. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
